column1: #Text=Just like the iPhone, some people will not get the Apple Watch.
#Text=Have a look at this YouTube video  https://youtu.be/eywi0h_Y5_U   Even MicroSofts CEO Steve Ballmer can make a mistake!
#Text=Of course if  Apples not your game, them your in luck most of the other manufactures have good discounts on there watches.
